attacks.name: Coordinate
attacks.effect: Choose up to 2 of your Benched Pokémon that have no Pokémon Tools attached to them. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Pokémon Tool card and attach it to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Leaf Storm
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from each of your Grass Pokémon.
